import { Button, Col, Form, Input, Row, Select } from "antd" import { useState } from "react" const { Option } = Select const CreateBannerForm = () => { const [imageUrl, setImageUrl] = useState("") const onFinish = (values: any) => ({ ...values, imageUrl: imageUrl, }) const normFile = (e: any) => { if (Array.isArray(e)) { return e } return e && e.fileList } return (
{/* { setImageUrl(values?.image?.response?.payload?.link) }} action="https://mighty-mickey.poshapets.com/api/v1/images/upload" listType="picture"> */}
{ console.log(e) }} layout="vertical" onFinish={onFinish} initialValues={{ title: "", bannerUrl: "", bannerType: "" }}>
) } export default CreateBannerForm
